title: The Fairy King
description: Elora is a kind girl, who loves to garden, and has a soft spot for tiny creatures. She also loves to tell stories, and would be delighted if magic were real, but she knows it isn't. At least, she thinks she knows it isn't. Unfortunately, the fairy king has taken an interest in her, and she is about to find out how wrong she is. The fairy king plunges her into a world of magic and danger, but when she tries to tell her family and friends, they only think she has come up with her best story yet. That is, until they start to notice that peculiar things happen whenever she's around...
author: Laura Gilfillan
